alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Cobb; Coweta; Douglas; North Fulton; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 12:02AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Carroll, southwestern Cobb, central Douglas, north central Coweta and southwestern Fulton Counties through 1230 AM EST ... At 1202 AM EST, a strong thunderstorm was over Chattahoochee Hills, or 11 miles southwest of City of South Fulton, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Douglasville, City of South Fulton, Smyrna, Powder Springs, Austell, Palmetto, Lithia Springs, Chattahoochee Hills, Sweetwater Creek State Park, Byers Crossroads, Chapel Hill, Six Flags Over Georgia, Campbellton, Roscoe, Sandtown, and Mableton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Cobb; Coweta; Douglas; North Fulton; South Fulton
